lexUnit.name: abhorrence.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies

lexUnit.definition: FN: the act or feeling of abhorring

sentence.text: It is possible for such sentiments of approval of this past to coexist with abhorrence for most current acts of violence .
